Price: $299.99 - $229.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

5,000mAh Super Battery

Never search for a power outlet again, the F91 5G offers a long lasting 5,000mAh battery that can last all day and all night. 18W Quick Charging along with Wireless Charger for a stress-free experience.

Unlock Your World

The F91 5G ensures total security for all your important applications and files. Unlocked your smartphone with a press of a finger or simply use its face ID technology.

Android 11

Android 11 is optimized for how you use your phone, giving you powerful device controls, and easier ways to manager conversations, privacy setting and so much more.

The Power of 5G, F91 5G provides lightning-fast connectivity experience whenever and wherever you are
3-Day Battery to fit your busy lifestyle, a powerful 5,000mAh battery and 18W Quick charging along with 10W Wireless charging for a stress-free experience.
Boundless views with 6.8” Full HD+ Infinity dot display. Watch your favorite movies and play your favorite games with stunning color and resolution
Capture the best images and take the best selfies, with the Quad A.I 48MP Samsung GM1 sensor camera
Use your phone’s NFC to make payments. Built-in Android Pay for quick contactless checkouts.
Do more and play more! with the MediaTek Dimensity810|6m, Arm Cortex A76 Octa-Core 2.4GHz processor

Read more

5,000mAh Super Battery

Face Unlock In 0.3 Seconds

Navigation

GPS + GLONASS + Galileo + Beidou

PS + GLONASS + Galileo + Beidou

【Android 12 Smartphone & Helio G25 Octa Core & NFC】The latest Android 12 unlocked cell phone equips 4GB RAM + 64GB ROM and an octa-core processor to provide a smooth scrolling experience and multi-tasking operation. External TF card storage up to 512GB. (NFC Support)
【6.0″ HD Smooth Touching Screen】Unlocked android phones with a bright 6.0″ HD screen provides crisp, clear images to upgrade your visual experience. Dual sim cell phone equips Face ID unlocked making it operate with ease.
【4200mAh Long Battery Life】Support 10W Type-C quick charging DOOGEE X97 Pro unlocked smartphone is long-lasting to browse social media, game playing, and do phone chating without interruption. Android 12 phone equips OTG function that directly connects for data transmission and supports reverse charging. Charge other devices which in lower battery condition. 10 days standby, 1-2 days of everyday use, and 16 hours of calling.
【Triple Camera System】DOOGE X97 Pro smartphone with12MP AI main camera, 2MP portrait camera, and stunning selfies with a 5MP front-facing camera to capture crisp moment.
【Satisfaction Guaranteed】DOOGEE is committed to providing our consumers the absolute best value and quality on our entire line of rugged smartphones. As DOOGEE smartphone valued members, you have a 2-year free warranty, 30 days of money back without reason, and a 7/24 professional team here to serve you with any problems.
